file_content.text: Attention all units: security breach detected in Sector G. Do not leave your posts. Reinforcements are not required at this time. Let the cthon handle the intruders.
Intruders have entered the main perimeter. Security Units 1, 3 and 5 converge on Sector K and eliminate the threat.
We are experiencing a critical security breach! Targets include both armed intruders and hostile cthon.
All available personnel converge on Sector L immediately! Targets must be terminated with extreme prejudice!
I should have guessed you were behind this. Your Alliance has brought nothing but death and destruction on the Republic!
You took down a lot of my people today. Good soldiers. True patriots. But your tyranny ends now!
I want you to meet my friend. He doesn't say much, and he's very, very hungry!
I wanted to bring the Alliance down... killing you myself should do the trick!
I will never bow to your Alliance!
I gladly bleed for the Republic!
Better to die free than live in chains...
